name: MyAppCI
description: Task to upload apk and ipa files into a CI branch configured in MyAppCI.com. Professional subscription is required.
author: MyAppCI
instanceNameFormat: Echo MyAppCI publishing app to Branch: $(branchid), File: $(filepath)

inputs.name: branchid
inputs.label: Branch Id (CI Branch)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The branch id for a configured CI branch.

inputs.name: apikey
inputs.label: API Key of the branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The API key for a configured CI branch.

inputs.name: filepath
inputs.label: Filename of IPA and APK (including extension)
inputs.helpMarkDown: User a file name even with a relative path e.g. /deploy/Myapp.apk
